q1.question: Is my PDF file secure?
q1.answer: Yes, all processing is done in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

q2.question: What is the maximum file size?
q2.answer: The tool can handle PDFs up to 50MB, depending on your browser's capabilities.

q3.question: Can I split password-protected PDFs?
q3.answer: No, you need to remove the password protection before splitting.

q4.question: What happens if I enter invalid page numbers?
q4.answer: The tool will show an error message if page numbers exceed the PDF's total pages.

q5.question: Can I split multiple PDFs at once?
q5.answer: Currently, you can only split one PDF at a time.

q6.question: What format will the output be?
q6.answer: Single file outputs are PDF. Multiple files are packaged in a ZIP archive.
